alert.note: Alert for Audubon; Greene; Guthrie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 12:26AM CDT until June 15 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN GREENE...NORTHERN GUTHRIE AND EAST CENTRAL AUDUBON COUNTIES... At 1226 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Guthrie Center, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Guthrie Center around 1230 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Bayard, Lake Panorama, Springbrook State Park, Bagley, Yale and Lakin Slough Game Management Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
